data.title: Interview with George Sheehan, April 1, 1987
data.meta_description: Interview with George Sheehan, cardiologist, runner, and author. In the interview, Sheehan discusses his insights about heart health and running.
data.text:
Description

Interview with George Sheehan, cardiologist, runner, and author. In the interview, Sheehan discusses his insights about heart health and running.

Physical Description

1 recording (27 min., 24 sec.) : sd., col.

Creation Information

Context

This video is part of the collection entitled: Abilene Library Consortium and was provided by the Abilene Christian University Library to The Portal to Texas History, a digital repository hosted by the UNT Libraries. It has been viewed 2024 times, with 16 in the last month. More information about this video can be viewed below.
